title: How does the payment process work?

sections.title: Symptoms
content: • I use Unity Ads and would like to know how I can receive payments from the revenue my game has generated.

sections.title: Cause
content: You would like to know how you can receive the earnings from your game.

sections.title: Resolution
content: Unity Ads currently only offers payments by wire transfer. To request payment, you must submit an invoice to accountspayable-fi@unity3d.com. The minimum earnings balance required to submit an invoice is $100 USD.
When you submit an invoice for the first time, you need to include your bank account information using the bank information form.

sections.title: More Information
content: Please see the payment request documentation for more details.
